General.Name: Columbus
General.Description: Columbus Energy S.A. provides solar photovoltaics and heat pumps installation and maintenance services in Poland. It also provides energy storage units; distributes electricity; and operates electric car charging stations. The company was formerly known as Columbus Capital S.A. and changed its name to Columbus Energy S.A. in March 2016. Columbus Energy S.A. was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Kraków, Poland.
